pages.text: Poisonous plants known as $(thing)Aechor Plants$() can be found across the islands of the $(thing)Aether$(). These plants are very unfriendly, and will fire poisonous barbs at anyone who dares to venture close to it, inflicting the $(thing)intoxicated$() effect. Using a $(item)Skyroot Bucket$(), they can be milked for their poison.$(br2)Killing an $(thing)Aechor Plant$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.
